sys_script.name: onUserPreferenceQuery

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_700aec722fc020109e9157892799b68f
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>true</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_42999_store_inc_user_preferences</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>onUserPreferenceQuery</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	// If there is no User Preferences doc for the specified user, create one now
	// with default values
	var msgs = [];
	
	var ecq = current.getEncodedQuery();
	
	msgs.push(ecq);
	
	// Get the param carrying the sysid of the user whose preference doc we want to
	// return. If there is no matching preferences doc, create one now.
	// 
	// Note the assumption that the calling Data Item has its filter set to "User = xxx".
	// If it were set up as "User.SysID = xxx" the encoded query syntax would be different
	// than what we are sniffing for here.
	var index = ecq.indexOf('u_user='); 
	
	msgs.push("index of 'u_user=' is " + index);
	
	if(index > -1) {
		var start_index = index + 'u_user='.length;
		var end_index = index + 'u_user='.length + 32;
		
		msgs.push(start_index);
		msgs.push(end_index);
		
		var user_sysid = ecq.substring(start_index, end_index);
		
		msgs.push("user sysid is " + user_sysid);
		
		// If no match, create one now.
		var gr = new GlideRecord("x_42999_store_inc_user_preferences");
		gr.addQuery('u_user', user_sysid);
		gr.query();
		if( !(gr.next()) ) {
			msgs.push("no record");
			msgs.push("inserting new record");
			
			gr.initialize();
			gr.setValue('u_user', user_sysid);
			var new_sysid = gr.insert();
			
			if(new_sysid) {
				msgs.push("new user pref record "+ new_sysid);
			} else {
				msgs.push("Could not insert new user pref record!");
			}
		} else {
			msgs.push("Found user preference doc " + gr.getValue('sys_id'));
		}
	}
	
	gs.info( msgs.join('\n') );
	
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-10-27 20:05:30</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>700aec722fc020109e9157892799b68f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>28</sys_mod_count><sys_name>onUserPreferenceQuery</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Store Incidents POC" source="x_42999_store_inc">4823ba6b2f2310109e9157892799b604</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Store Incidents POC">4823ba6b2f2310109e9157892799b604</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_700aec722fc020109e9157892799b68f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-10-28 14:35:05</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=700aec722fc020109e9157892799b68f"/></record_update>
